answers.answer: you can try exercising at home too.. i normally dance when at home.. they said that it helps with labor and strengthens your body..
I have a lot of cleaning that needs to be done. Its just I have gestational diabetes and I go walking to help keep my sugars down.
Walking is such great exercise.  You could be one of those mall walkers.  ;D
I just walk while I watch tv! :)
Walking in the mall is a good idea when it's cold !
@rockrose that would be nice@alexjandraMV how? I don't have room for a treadmill lol

question: I go walking everyday twice a day and I was going to stop walking in December (I'm due dec 14) because it will get to cold. But I want to still be active. If its not to cold I'll still walk but I might not as much. What do y'all think?
title: does anyone think this is a good or bad idea?
